code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:patient presents with 2 years history of mild weakness, mild bleeding between periods, Blood. pt reports mild persistent fatigue. she is a 22 yr old white female brain surgeon. o:Height 62 in, Weight 110 lbs, Temperature 98.8 F, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 16 a:Anemia p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed IRON - 65 mg daily, and ordered CBC, serum iron, TIBC.
